thread.section_title: TransferWise Reviews | Read Customer Service Reviews of transferwise.com | 31 of 1820
thread.title: Lucia

author: Lucia
title: Lucia
text: After moving abroad I used Transferwise several times to do international transfer of large amounts and I was extremely satisfied by the service. The website is very easy to use and the security steps are very reassuring. My money was transferred in less than 48h. I strongly recommend using Transferwise as in addition to the great service, the conversion rate is the best you can find.
